actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit (along with its regular estimate of the Federal cost involved) an estimate of the cost which would be incurred by State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.
short_title: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1981

summary.text: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1981 - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit (along with its regular estimate of the Federal cost involved) an estimate of the costs which would be incurred by State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.

titles.title: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1981

A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit (along with its regular estimate of the Federal cost involved) an estimate of the cost which would be incurred by State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.
